title: Drive DeVilbiss Healthcare acquires product line of De Oro Devices
body: Drive DeVilbiss Healthcare (DDH) has acquired the product line of De Oro Devices, the California-based company behind NexStride, a mobility aid designed to help people with Parkinson's

title: De Oro Devices Names Cori Lathan, PhD, as New CEO
